content: materials medium weight 4 yarn i used colors ecru honey adobe olive pomegranate mahogany i really enjoyed working with this yarn i have already bought more and have future pattern planned with it number of skeins needed these are 100g skeins of yarn and i used a total of 6 different colors as shown below you will need an extra skein of yarn of the color you chose for your ribbing xs/s you need 1 skein of each color and 2 skeins for the color you use for the ribbing m/l & xl/2xl you need 2 skeins of each color and 3 skeins for the color you use for the ribbing 3xl/4xl you need 3 skeins of each color and 4 skeins for the color you use for the ribbing 5 00mm crochet hook scissors darning needle buttons i linked some similar ones but i can t link the ones i used because i used mismatched 19mm buttons i had laying around in my craft stash you can really use whatever button style/size you d like i think some wooden buttons would look lovely pattern notes *cardigan is meant to be a boxy slightly oversized with crop fit if you do not like that maybe consider sizing down *this pattern follows size xs/s but has sizes xs-4xl *this pattern uses us crochet terms *turning chain 3 does count as a double_crochet stitch in this pattern turning chain 1 does not count as a single_crochet stitch *when making the granny squares you will be work in chain spaces and not in stitches *for every size you will need 27 panel squares and 8 sleeve squares
